title: NASA Puts Starliner Mishap in Same Class as Shuttle Tragedies
desc: NASA is putting the botched 2024 test flight of the Starliner capsule in the same category of disaster as the Challenger and Columbia shuttle accidents, underscoring the dramatic failures that kept a pair of astronauts stuck in space for nine months.

title: 'Bridgerton' Star Yerin Ha Named 2026 Actor Awards Ambassador
desc: “Bridgerton” breakout Yerin Ha has been named as the ambassador for the 2026 Actor Awards, presented by SAG-AFTRA.

title: 10 Biotin-Rich Foods That Support Healthy Hair and Brain Function, According to RDs
desc: Get ready to eat more salmon, sweet potatoes, and more.

title: Three busted for cannabis on Trans Kalahari road
desc: THREE men were arrested for the possession of cannabis worth over N$300 000 on the Trans Kalahari Road after an intense police chase.

title: Khomas region divorce statistics: 63% of divorcees are women
desc: %%title%% %%sep%% %%primary_category%% %%sep%% %%sitename%% %%sep%% A total of 3 088 women in the Khomas region have gone through divorce, representing 63% of the divorced population in the region, the Namibia Statistics Agency has revealed.

title: AI helps find new clues in the 60-year search for Luna 9, the 1st successful moon lander
desc: Scientists may have narrowed down the landing site of the Soviet Union's Luna 9, which in 1966 became the first spacecraft to touch down softly on the moon.

title: Morocco seeks two years jail for 18 Senegalese fans
desc: Moroccan prosecutors seek up to two-year jail terms for 18 Senegalese fans jailed in Rabat over alleged hooliganism after the AFCON final.

title: This Android Malware Connects to Google Gemini for Tips on Hacking Targets
desc: 'PromptSpy' appears to be the first Android malware that uses generative AI in its execution flow, according to antivirus provider ESET.
